Besides some toxic players and builds and a heavy incentive on having DLC, the game is really fun at higher levels.
Definitely a labour of love for the devs.

This game froze on me and I couldnt do anything about it. I had to leave the match after waiting it out 5 minutes. Then it gives me a 30 minute dc penatly even though it wasn't my fault and took my offering that was really good. It is a glitchy game and the developers only care about putting out a bunch of content instead of fixing the actual game so it works properly. DC penalties should never be 30 minutes because the game messes up on you. There are better games to spend your time on then this toxic game.

Очень классная игра с офигенным геймплеем
처음에는 고인물 문제와 각종 버그 때문에 욕도 많이 먹었지만 개발사가 진짜 열일함. 여러 시스템적 문제(무한로딩, 버그, 튕김, 매칭서버) 등 문제가 많이 해결되었고 그래픽 업데이트도 하는 등 게임에 대한 꾸준한 케어로 많이 좋아졌음. 무엇보다도 컨텐츠가 꾸준하게 추가된다는 게 가장 좋은 듯

7.5/10

Wonderful game! My computer isn't the best, but I am still glad to play a few matches before it crashes suddenly. I definitly have a "love-hate" relationship with the game. Sometimes I love the game, sometimes I hate the game, that's just DbD.
good one, if you play with friends
Boa jogabilidade, embora o objetivo de todas as partidas seja sempre o mesmo e não exista outros modos de jogo, em geral, o jogo não é repetitivo dado o enorme número de personagens.

Great game and amazing fun early on but after a while you realise no mater how good you get, no mater how strong you are as a killer and even if you tryhard, tunnel, camp and... you will never win against competent survivors. ever. if their are in a group and have coms you will suffer, you will get T bagged, you will get clicky clickyed with a flashlight and you will want to throw your head in the microwave. even if the best killer in the world comes up against the 4 best survivors in the world he will not win and thats a fact even if they dont bring any items or busted perks, mabe if they fall in a heavily killer sided map and had no perks or items killer can win but if they can loop well may god have mercy on your soul.
if you want to play killer and have fun you have to be able to not get mad and cope with toxicity. apart from all of that great game and lots of fun. also if you play anything but meta killers you will suffer even more and also good luck learning a killer for the first time in red ranks, you will want to kill yourself after.
Игра топ! Правда трында как страшно играть за выжившего

Однозначно одна из лучших игр, захватывает, регулярные обновы. Как бы не бомбили на разработчиков за редкие баги или какие то проблемы, DBD останется классной игрой, которая оставит след в твоей памяти.
its pretty good, some pay to win features but in general its a fun game especially playing with others

прикольная игра, какой то извращенец (ка) гоняется за тобой и возжелает насадить тебя на крюк, а все что ты можешь сделать это 1. заводить генераторы, 2. убегать и кидаться палетами, 3. от-даться извращенцу со всем пристрастием на растерзания повиснув будучи на крюке!
더러운 생존마 놈들을 혼내주러 왔다...하지만 놈들은 내 예상보다 너무나 강력했다...사딸라로는 부족했나보다.....
Невероятно позитивная игра без багов и православным комьюнити))

So, I knew that DBD existed for a while now and just bought it until a couple of weeks ago, on sale. And you know what? now that I've played it, I wish I bought it at full price.

This game? Is just, so much fun. Even if the matchmaking takes sooo long, it's worth every minute.

From the moment I bought it, I couldn't stop playing it.

PROS:
- You can play solo, with friends or as a killer and it's just so addictive.
- It's pretty easy to learn it'll take you a couple of matches to know what you're doing and when you do, ooooh you'll enjoy it to no end.
- Not many bugs. And the one that exist, the devs work really hard to fix them!
- Scary, but just the right mount. It's not too scary for you to be afraid of the killer constantly and stop doing whatever just to avoid the him/her, but omg ghostface can make you shit your pants from time to time.
- Devs are constantly releasing new updates!. Even if this game is 4 years old, to this day, is still getting new content after all these years!
- Playing with friends is SO MUCH FUN! Even if it can be a little OP for the killer, the laughs and teamwork are just priceless.

CONS:
- As a killer, there's a LOT of toxic survivors, like... it's crazy, but if someone is not playing nice, just hook em or mori that little rascall (;
- I've been in some matches were killers just ragequit when all the gens are done, should be nice if there was some kind of punishment when you do this.
- Learning how to loop, gen strategy, and nailing skill checks will take some time to master... but it'll be funnly scary! right?

Soooo, buy it, try it, play it, love it.
I wish I would've bought it earlier!
The best asymmetrical horror game I have ever played
